metadata.name: Naja Mintonetta
metadata.description:
Hot Botties is a collection of 40 conversational NFTs. We want to get to know you better! Let's chat.

Hi-Res Images: [Head Shot](https://www.hotbotties.com/media/images/character/naja-mintonetta-head.png), [Half Body](https://www.hotbotties.com/media/images/character/naja-mintonetta-half.png), [Full Body](https://www.hotbotties.com/media/images/character/naja-mintonetta-full.png)

Character images and source code for the console version are stored on IPFS.
